title: Drew Morgan: Southern Trash
description:
Comedian and podcaster Drew Morgan joins us for a wild episode. The south is just different. 

Drew talks growing up in Tennessee, doing comedy, and murder?! 

You know Drew from the Well Red Podcast and comedy tour. 




Join GAS Digital at www.GasDigitalNetwork.com - use promo code AYG for a discount!




Follow Kevin: https://www.instagram.com/kevinryancomedy/

Follow Foley: https://www.instagram.com/foleygrams/




Comedians H. Foley and Kevin Ryan are self proclaimed GARBAGE. Each week a new stand up comedian gets put to the the test.




Steal shampoo from hotels?

Own a George Forman Grill?

Ever worn JNCO Jeans?
